name: Beat This!
description:
Keep your balls up with Beat This!

- Such a simple game, anyone can play
- A new ball will appear every 4 seconds, and balls live for 10 seconds
- Game over when no more balls are alive!

Watch out for obstacles and power-ups - some will help you, some won't!

Either touch the screen or tilt your device to move your paddle - there are different high score tables for each control mode.

With 3 difficulty levels and 50 achievements to work towards, you will be busy for a long time!

Share your results to Facebook and Twitter - challenge your friends to beat your score.

Exclusively on iOS - share videos of your last game to Facebook, Twitter or YouTube using Kamcord!
